Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I present you my first creation, the Korolev Rocket 1.

is dedicated to the famous Soviet engineer.

Mission log:

Highest Altitude 426\'158 meters

Highest Speed 2055,8 m/s
Four active SAS modules just to be jettisoned with the very first stage separation? Why? o_O
Get rid of the ASAS modules, they\'re pretty much dead weight.
I will try to change it, although I\'m already working on Korolev 2.
I\'m guessing that someone out there has the same design, yet different name... :

this is an idea, and I like your tri-coupler usage.

In fact I think I hve a similar rocket, just larger that I shall now release.

I\'m guessing that someone out there has the same design, yet different name... :

The rocket is very simple model, many people I think they did a similar thing.

After the realization of the rocket Korolev 2 which hit 700000 meters, I have dedicated myself to the realization of a rocket to get to the Mun.

Too bad that for a series of maneuvers are done wrong to orbit around the sun, no return, since the fuel was finished.

Farewell brave kerbonauts dispersed in space. :\'(
give it 10000 years, they will get back (thats how I made a moon landing!)
